name: Play Music - Disable Radio
description: Disables all radio features on Google Play Music. This messes up the formatting for the Listen Now, creating some empty space, but cleans up all of the radio features.
additional_info: Let me know of any bugs/suggestions via the Google Play Help Forum: https://productforums.google.com/forum/?&utm_source=footer#!topic/play/_llFeqP9sJY
